content.prompt: A home uses fuel oil at the rate  r( t )=10+8sin( t 60 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@450C@ gallons per day, where t is the number of days from the beginning of the heating season. To the nearest gallon, what is the total amount of fuel oil used from t = 0 to t = 60 days?

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
